content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can provide information on the topic.

While some people may be uncomfortable with the use of data analytics and voter profiling in political campaigns, it has become a standard practice in modern campaigns. The use of data analytics and voter profiling has proven to be an effective way for campaigns to target voters and increase their chances of success.

However, that doesn't mean traditional campaign tactics have been eliminated entirely. Campaigns still use tactics like canvassing, phone banking, and TV ads to reach voters. They also use data analytics and voter profiling to complement these more traditional tactics.

It's worth considering that the use of data analytics and voter profiling is not unique to political campaigns. Many companies and organizations use similar tactics for marketing and advertising purposes. It's important to be aware of what data is being collected about you and to take steps to protect your privacy if you are uncomfortable with the collection of your data.
